alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Citrus, central Sumter, northeastern Pasco and Hernando Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mascotte to near Bushnell to near Hernando County Airport. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Brooksville, Bushnell, Weeki Wachee, Hill n Dale, South Brooksville, North Brooksville, Hernando County Airport, North Weeki Wachee, Timber Pines, Ridge Manor, Center Hill, Webster, Royal Highlands, High Point, Lake Lindsey, Shady Hills, Glen Lakes, Sumterville and Floral City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter
